game.name: They Came From Below
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 전략
game.shortDescription: They Came From Below is a cute Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. Here you have to build an economy and various defense towers to resist hordes of skeletons.
game.shortDescriptionEn: They Came From Below is a cute Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. Here you have to build an economy and various defense towers to resist hordes of skeletons.
